summary: This document appears to be trial preparation notes from September 3, 2021, prepared by AUSAs (Assistant United States Attorneys) and SA (Special Agent) for witness testimony. It contains previously undisclosed, clarifying, or different recollections from a witness regarding interactions with JE (Jeffrey Epstein) and GM (Ghislaine Maxwell), including details of sexual abuse, requests for sexual acts, travel arrangements, and descriptions of clothing.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as JE in the document. The witness describes being told to rub his shoulders upon first meeting, being raped by him in Palm Beach, and details about his travel and residences.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as GM in the document. The witness states GM asked multiple times if she knew anyone who could give JE a blowjob, helped arrange travel, and claimed to have known the witness for a while.

connections.description: GM is depicted as actively facilitating JE's sexual abuse by asking the witness to find someone to perform a sex act on him and coordinating travel/logistics for meetings with JE.
The witness is a victim of JE's rape and describes GM's role in the associated abuse and facilitation.

events.title: First meeting with JE
events.description: The witness states that the first time she met JE, she was told to rub his shoulders.

events.title: GM's request for sexual act
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell asked the witness, during an in-person visit, if she knew anyone who could give JE a blowjob, and asked multiple times.

events.title: Rape in Palm Beach
events.description: JE raped the witness in Palm Beach. During the rape, he made comments about making JE cheat on GM. He didn't say anything to her afterward.

events.title: Last sighting of JE before prison
events.description: The witness last saw JE before he went to prison, and the last time was in Paris.

keyFacts: The witness provides a new, specific allegation that Ghislaine Maxwell repeatedly asked her to find someone to perform oral sex on Jeffrey Epstein.
The witness describes being raped by Jeffrey Epstein in Palm Beach, during which he made comments about 'making JE cheat on GM'.
The witness details logistical arrangements, stating she sometimes booked her own travel to meet JE/GM, and that either GM or JE's secretary would send a driver for her in New York.
The witness describes the 'schoolgirl outfit' in Palm Beach as consisting of a pleated skirt, white shirt, white socks, and white underpants.
The document is explicitly marked as containing information subject to a protective order (paragraphs 7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
